JUL 12 1962
General Serylons Administration/789 Region 7 Dallas , Texas U. S. A.
Subject: Recess Proverty
Gentleman,
We have requirement for one Tractor, Catalog Bo. 83-1-6, Page 6, Control No. 7-02-1408, Ztem 1, Condition R-S. Please advise availability. If your reply is in the affirmative we will- Lomediately forward our purchase order.
Sincerely yours,
B. T. Potter Supply Advisor
